::Ramulus::

Ramulus nods, stopping. He looks up, seeing the earth above him. Ramulus' 
eyes widen as he looks at the planet. This is the first time he had seen it 
from afar. He would never forget how it looked.

Suddenly, a desire to see Cybertron flared in the Maximal. Irrationally, he 
wonders if the shuttle they had taken from earth could get all the way to 
Cybertron. He shakes the thought out of his mind. He was needed here, in the 
war, where he had been for the last many years. The Maximals needed him, and 
he had fought to the death for the Maximal cause, and would again if needed.

Ramulus looks at Fliq. "What does Cybertron look like?" he asks curioustly.
